name: Prescription Drugs: Top 300
description: Learning essential information about the top 300 prescription drugs doesnt have to be tedious. With Prescription Drug Cards: Top 300, youll get a comprehensive, easy-to-use study tool that will tell you everything you need to know about these most-prescribed drugs. And as a bonus, youll get the top 100 non-prescription drugs, too. This tool is ready to go with quick image and information retrievalno Internet connection necessary!  Features:  Youll learn crucial information about the top 300 prescription drugs, including:    Generic and common name  Class  Dosage Forms  Approved Dose and Indications  Off-Label Use  Contraindications  Adverse Reactions  Drug Interactions  Monitoring Parameters  Medication Safety Issues and Black Box Warnings  Learn vital drug information: Download Prescription Drug Cards: Top 300!
